subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The 70-1 long shot All Squared Away won the $200,000 Grade 3 Lexington Stakes at Keeneland, spoiling Castaway’s Kentucky Derby chances.
snippet: The 70-1 long shot All Squared Away won the $200,000 Grade 3 Lexington Stakes at Keeneland, spoiling Castaway’s Kentucky Derby chances.
